entry.tran: (浇花草的)洒水器;喷水灭火装置
entry.def: A sprinkler is a device used to spray water. Sprinklers are used to water plants or grass, or to put out fires in buildings.

means.word_mean: 1. mechanical device that attaches to a garden hose for watering lawn or garden
